text: Mark Mitten is an Academy Award nominated and Emmy Award winning film producer. He is best known for Abacus: Small Enough to Jail nominated for the Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature. ==Filmography== * 2017: Frontline (TV Series documentary) (producer - 1 episode) * 2016: Abacus: Small Enough to Jail (Documentary) (producer) * 2014: Life Itself (Documentary) (executive producer) * 2012: The Most American City (Video short) (producer) * 2010: Making Big Plans: The Story of Chicago's Olympic Dream (TV Movie documentary) (producer) * 2004-2005: The Apprentice (TV Series) (task producer - 33 episodes) ==References== ==Externals== * Category:American film producers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Mark Mitten
